column3: ej,smolj001,P,tatat901,Intentional HBP ej,cangj001,P,tatat901,Charging the mound $John Cangelosi charged the mound and both benches emptied; Cangelosi and John Smoltz ejected by HP umpire Terry Tata; Cangelosi suspended four games and Smoltz eight games
ej,pavlg801,C,wintm901,Balls and strikes $Mets coach Pavlick ejected by HP umpire Winters for arguing balls and strikes after mound visit
ej,hundt001,P,kellj901,Balls and strikes (while catching) Mets catcher Todd Hundley ejected by HP umpire Jeff Kellogg for arguing balls and strikes while catching
ej,mccrt102,C,wintm901,Check swing $Mets coach McCraw ejected by 3B umpire Winters for arguing check swing strike on Orsulak from bench
ej,smito001,P,grege901,Call at 1B Ozzie Smith ejected by 1B umpire Eric Gregg
ej,lasot101,M,hallt901,Call at 3B $Dodgers manager Lasorda ejected by 2B umpire Hallion for arguing Butler was safe at 3rd
ej,bonib001,P,poncl901,Fair/foul call Bobby Bonilla ejected by 3B umpire Larry Poncino arguing that the double was foul
